1.name: Dr. Anya Sharma
1.description: Dr. Sharma specializes in helping students manage anxiety, stress, and depression through evidence-based CBT techniques. She has over 10 years of experience in the field.

2.name: Dr. Rohan Verma
2.description: Dr. Verma focuses on mindfulness-based approaches to help individuals cope with stress, improve focus, and enhance overall well-being. He is also a certified yoga instructor.

3.name: Dr. Priya Singh
3.description: Dr. Singh helps couples and individuals navigate relationship challenges, improve communication, and build stronger connections. She has a compassionate and non-judgmental approach.
